// Structure: Array
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdint>
#include <limits>
#include <string_view>

class ArrayStructure_String_3_prefix_suffix final {
    static constexpr std::array<std::string_view, 3> keys = {
        u8"text", u8"fetch", u8"fix"
    };

public:
    [[nodiscard]]
    static constexpr bool contains(const std::string_view key) noexcept {
         if (const size_t len = key.length(); len < 6u || len > 8u)
             return false;
        uint32_t firstChar = static_cast<uint32_t>(key.front());
        uint32_t lastChar = static_cast<uint32_t>(key.back());

        if (firstChar < 112u || firstChar > 112u || lastChar < 104u || lastChar > 120u)
            return false;
        if (!(key.compare(0, 3, u8"pre") == 0))
            return false;
        const auto trimmedKey = key.substr(3, key.length() - 3);

        for (size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++)
        {
            if (keys[i] == trimmedKey)
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr size_t item_count = 3;
    static constexpr size_t min_key_length = 6;
    static constexpr size_t max_key_length = 8;
    static constexpr bool has_number = false;
    static constexpr bool has_uppercase = false;
    static constexpr bool has_lowercase = true;
    static constexpr bool has_symbol = false;
    static constexpr bool has_whitespace = false;
};
